item.title: How to Download and Install Linux RHEL 9 for Free
item.description: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 (RHEL 9), codenamed Plow, has gone public (GA). Red Hat announced it on May 18, 2022. It replaced the beta version, which had been in existence since November 3, 2021. RHEL 9 is the first few releases in the Red Hat family. It is the first major release since IBM acquired Red Hat in July 2019, and the first major release since abandoning the CentOS project in favor of CentOS Stream, which is now RHEL’s predecessor.
